guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
You will gain progress here passively
while going for other grinds.
Â§lMake sure to always have a pet active!
Farm in the Garden. Remember Crop Milestones
grant a lot of XP. Carrots can also benefit this
as you can use pet candies made out of them to
contribute to another goal.
Going for the Slayer Goal will give you
quite some progress here if you do it
on your own with Revenant Bosses.
Do your daily commissions in the Dwarven Mines
(and Crystal Hollows). Also participate in any
active event there that you come across.
Use /warp trapper to accept a quest
and use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Bring a bow with you.
Mine Diamonds in the Mines of Divan
(HotM 3) or in the carts in the Dwarven Mines.
You can also passively work on this by using
Diamond Spreadings in your Minions if you want.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5).
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
Kill t2 Revenant Horrors to passively
progress in the Community Goal.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in The Park to get wood for your minions.
Place as many minions as you can
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.
Use a Silk Touch and Efficiency Golden Axe and
chop mushroom blocks in the Mushroom Desert.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
Get Enchanting Level 10 and play
the highest experiments in the
Experimentation Table that you can get.
Kill endermen and mine Nodes for
Enchanted Ender Pearls. You need them for
Enchanted Eyes of Ender (32 of those).
Don't forget to buy your daily Blaze Powder
from the Alchemist in the Hub.
Fish in The Park and make sure rain is active.
Do not stand/have your bobber under solid blocks
as this will slow your speed down by a lot.

note: Equip an Uncommon or higher tiered Rock Pet
guide: You get the Rock Pet from mining ores.
The Common Rock unlocks at 2.5k broken ores,
the Uncommon one at 7.5k. You can also upgrade
your common rock at Kat but this will take a day.
You will get this passively by leveling up
skills, if you don't forget to put the money
in your bank ;-)
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces including equipment)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste and Starlight Armor from Rosetta
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
You might wanna go further than that to
help with other goals.
You will unlock this while going
for Mushroom Collector.
Remember to get the Glowstone Dust
by buying a Glowstone from The Builder
and breaking it on your island.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub (-28 69 -125),
or enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (costs 50 Levels).
You might also get it from receiving a Splash.
Kill Cows in The Barn to unlock this
and craft it using the materials you
got along the way.
Apply it to an armor piece using the Blacksmith.
This can take quite some time and money
as it is RNG based.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels. Don't forget
to do some Alchemy with Materials gathered from the Garden.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Follow the Lone Adventurers quest in The End
until you get the Bow.
